$bot_script := Array \
"lwp" \
"python-httplib2" \
"python-requests" \
"python-urllib" \
"libwww-perl/" \
"ruby" \
"java/" \
"apache-httpclient/" \
"winhttp" \
"go-http-client/" \
"webdav client" \
"wordpress/" \
"curl" \
"wget" \
"microsoft office excel 2013" \
"struts-pwn (https://github.com/mazen160/struts-pwn)"

$bot_crawler_seo := Array \
"screaming frog seo spider/"

$bot_crawler_scraper := Array \
"scrapy" \
"advanced email extractor"

$bot_crawler_sitemapper := Array \
"visualsitemapper" \
"ahrefsbot"

$bot_crawler_searchengine := Array \
"twitterbot/" \
"bingbot/" \
"googlebot/" \
"applebot/" \
"yahoo! slurp;" \
"yandexBot/" \
"dataprovider/" \
"piplbot" \
"baiduspider" \
"Google-HTTP-Java-Client/"

$.Set "BrowserUaMinLength" 50
$.Set "BotMatcher" (NewAhoCorasickMatcher $bot)
$.Set "BotScriptMatcher" (NewAhoCorasickMatcher $bot_script)
$.Set "BotCrawlerSeoMatcher" (NewAhoCorasickMatcher $bot_crawler_seo)
$.Set "BotCrawlerScraperMatcher" (NewAhoCorasickMatcher $bot_crawler_scraper)
$.Set "BotCrawlerSitemapperMatcher" (NewAhoCorasickMatcher $bot_crawler_sitemapper)
$.Set "BotCrawlerSearchengineMatcher" (NewAhoCorasickMatcher $bot_crawler_searchengine)
sampleResponse:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Server: nginx
Date: Fri, 21 Aug 2015 21:30:50 GMT
Content-Type: text/html; charset=utf-8
Connection: keep-alive
Content-Length: 0
x-xss-protection: 1; mode=block
x-content-type-options: nosniff
pragma: no-cache
x-frame-options: SAMEORIGIN
Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=15552000; includeSubDomains
X-Request-ID: 123456789
preRule:
$botmap := NewMapAny
$botmap.Set "bot" ""
$botmap.Set "reason" ""

$ua_len := $.UserAgent | len

if $ua_len | LessEqual $.Config.BrowserUaMinLength
 $botmap.Set "bot" (printf "%s%s" $botmap.bot "🤖")
 $botmap.Set "reason" (printf "%s; UA Len: %d" $botmap.reason $ua_len)
end

if lower $.UserAgent | $.Config.BotMatcher.MatchOne
 $botmap.Set "bot" (printf "%s%s" $botmap.bot "🤖")
 $botmap.Set "reason" (printf "%s; Bot-UA: %s" $botmap.reason $.UserAgent)
end

if lower $.UserAgent | $.Config.BotScriptMatcher.MatchOne
 $botmap.Set "bot" (printf "%s%s" $botmap.bot "🤖")
 $botmap.Set "reason" (printf "%s; Script: %s" $botmap.reason $.UserAgent)
end

if lower $.UserAgent | $.Config.BotCrawlerSeoMatcher.MatchOne
 $botmap.Set "bot" (printf "%s%s" $botmap.bot "🤖")
 $botmap.Set "reason" (printf "%s; SEO: %s" $botmap.reason $.UserAgent)
end

if lower $.UserAgent | $.Config.BotCrawlerScraperMatcher.MatchOne
 $botmap.Set "bot" (printf "%s%s" $botmap.bot "🤖")
 $botmap.Set "reason" (printf "%s; Scraper: %s" $botmap.reason $.UserAgent)
end

if lower $.UserAgent | $.Config.BotCrawlerSitemapperMatcher.MatchOne
 $botmap.Set "bot" (printf "%s%s" $botmap.bot "🤖")
 $botmap.Set "reason" (printf "%s; Mapper: %s" $botmap.reason $.UserAgent)
end

if lower $.UserAgent | $.Config.BotCrawlerSearchengineMatcher.MatchOne
 $botmap.Set "bot" (printf "%s%s" $botmap.bot "🤖")
 $botmap.Set "reason" (printf "%s; Search: %s" $botmap.reason $.UserAgent)
end

if $.TagList | ContainsAny (Array "site.http-accept")
 $botmap.Set "bot" (printf "%s%s" $botmap.bot "🤖")
 $botmap.Set "reason" (printf "%s; Missing Accept" $botmap.reason)
end

if $botmap.bot | len | Greater 0
 $.AddSignal "site.bot" "REQUEST" (printf "%s%s" $botmap.bot $botmap.reason) $ruleid
end
sampleRequest:
POST /foobar?key1=value1 HTTP/1.1
Host: sample.foo
Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate
Accept-Language: en-us
Accept: text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,*/*;q=0.8
Connection: keep-alive
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
Content-Length: 10000
Cookie:
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_10_4) AppleWebKit/600.7.12 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/8.0.7 Safari/600.7.12
Cache-Control: max-age=0
X-Forwarded-For: 127.0.0.1
X-Forwarded-Proto: https

postkey1=value1&post2=value2
